text: Pitcairnia reflexiflora is a species of flowering plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Flora of Ecuador reflexiflora Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Édouard André
title: Pitcairnia reflexiflora
